job_details.Functieomschrijving:
We're looking for a Lead AI Engineer with a strong background in generative AI models and an interest in Privacy Enhancing Technologies (PET). The ideal candidate will explore the intersection of generative AI and MPC, developing new techniques and methodologies that allow for secure, distributed AI computations. You will be working with the Nillion Product team and report to Nillion's AI Product Lead., * You will design & execute a technical AI roadmap towards bridging the gap between AI and confidential computing, in close collaboration with our AI and cryptography team
     * You will work closely with our cryptography team, getting up to speed with the technical nuances & implementing AI models accordingly
     * You will adapt AI model architectures to work in a performant way under a confidential computing paradigm and technically implement these architectures in our AI toolkit
     * You will have regular touchpoints with AI developers on the Nillion network and integrate their feedback in our AI roadmap
     * You will work closely with our DevRel team and actively contribute to creating easy-to-use AI tools and suitable AI development workflows
job_details.full_text:
Lead AI Engineer

We're looking for a Lead AI Engineer with a strong background in generative AI models and an interest in Privacy Enhancing Technologies (PET). The ideal candidate will explore the intersection of generative AI and MPC, developing new techniques and methodologies that allow for secure, distributed AI computations. You will be working with the Nillion Product team and report to Nillion's AI Product Lead., * You will design & execute a technical AI roadmap towards bridging the gap between AI and confidential computing, in close collaboration with our AI and cryptography team
     * You will work closely with our cryptography team, getting up to speed with the technical nuances & implementing AI models accordingly
     * You will adapt AI model architectures to work in a performant way under a confidential computing paradigm and technically implement these architectures in our AI toolkit
     * You will have regular touchpoints with AI developers on the Nillion network and integrate their feedback in our AI roadmap
     * You will work closely with our DevRel team and actively contribute to creating easy-to-use AI tools and suitable AI development workflows

profile_classification.rationale: The role heavily emphasizes working with generative AI models, adapting them for confidential computing, and developing AI tools and workflows. This aligns directly with the core responsibilities of a GenAI Engineer, focusing on generative techniques and building applications around them.

phrases.phrase: design & execute a technical AI roadmap towards bridging the gap between AI and confidential computing
phrases.justification: This phrase indicates the need to understand the strategic direction and technical goals of integrating AI with confidential computing, aligning technical efforts with broader objectives.

phrases.phrase: in close collaboration with our AI and cryptography team
phrases.justification: Highlights the need to work with different teams to understand their needs and integrate AI solutions within a larger product context.

phrases.phrase: integrate their feedback in our AI roadmap
phrases.justification: Shows the importance of incorporating feedback from various stakeholders (AI developers) into the strategic technical plan.

phrases.phrase: strong background in generative AI models
phrases.justification: Directly mentions expertise in generative AI models, which is a core aspect of this task category.

phrases.phrase: explore the intersection of generative AI and MPC
phrases.justification: Indicates research and development involving generative AI techniques.

phrases.phrase: developing new techniques and methodologies that allow for secure, distributed AI computations
phrases.justification: Focuses on creating and refining AI models and approaches for specific, advanced use cases.
Refers to the practical application and implementation of AI models.

phrases.phrase: adapt AI model architectures to work in a performant way under a confidential computing paradigm
phrases.justification: Involves modifying and optimizing existing AI model architectures for specific constraints, a key modeling task.

phrases.phrase: technically implement these architectures in our AI toolkit
phrases.justification: Relates to the practical implementation and integration of AI model architectures.
Implies building new approaches and potentially the software components to support them.
Suggests writing code to integrate and run AI models.

phrases.phrase: technically implement these architectures in our AI toolkit
phrases.justification: Directly refers to the implementation of technical architectures, likely involving software development.

phrases.phrase: contribute to creating easy-to-use AI tools
phrases.justification: Indicates the development of software tools for AI applications.
Suggests building or contributing to the software infrastructure that supports AI development.

phrases.phrase: design & execute a technical AI roadmap
phrases.justification: Roadmap execution often involves planning and managing the deployment and lifecycle of AI systems.

phrases.phrase: contribute to creating easy-to-use AI tools and suitable AI development workflows
phrases.justification: Developing workflows and tools often includes aspects of deployment, integration, and operationalization of AI models.
